mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA(QNANUM, QNATITLE, QNACON, QNAWRITER, QNAPW, QNAEMAIL, QNAFILE, QNAINSERTDATE, QNAUPDATEDATE, DELYN) VALUES(#{qnanum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qnatitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qnacon, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qnawriter, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qnapw, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qnaemail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qnafile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'Y')
